languages.text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus is 10 or higher, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативника{/g} составляет 10 или более, он получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} урона противников.

traits.locale_text: While the Adept's Perception bonus is 10 or higher, they gain +1 AP and ignore enemies' damage deflection.
While the Adept's Perception bonus is 10 or higher, they gain +1 AP and ignore enemies' damage deflection.

While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus is 10 or higher, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus is 10 or higher, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

languages.text: Когда бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативника{/g} составляет 10 или более, он получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} урона противников.
languages.original_text: While the Adept's Perception bonus is 10 or higher, they gain +1 AP and ignore enemies' damage deflection.

traits.locale_text: Когда бонус Восприятия адепта составляет 10 или более, он получает +1 ОД и игнорирует отражение урона противников.
Когда бонус Восприятия адепта составляет 10 или более, он получает +1 ОД и игнорирует отражение урона противников.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}为10或更高时，特工额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，且所有攻击无视目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is 10 or higher, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当技师的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}为10或更高时，技师额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，且所有攻击无视目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。

languages.text: Cuando la bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} es de 10 o más, gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} e ignora el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de daño de los enemigos.
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus is 10 or higher, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del agente es de 10 o más, gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} e ignora el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de los enemigos.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が10以上の場合、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が+1増加し、敵のダメージ{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を無視する。
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is 10 or higher, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: アデプトの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が10以上の場合、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が+1増加し、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し効果{/g}を無視する。

languages.text: Hat der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agent{/g} einen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von 10 oder höher, erhält er +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und ignoriert die Schaden-{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} seiner Gegner.
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus is 10 or higher, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Während der Agent einen {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von 10 oder höher hat, erlangt er +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und ignoriert die {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} seiner Feinde.

languages.text: Tant que le bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g} est supérieur ou égal à 10, celui-ci bénéficie de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} des ennemis.
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus is 10 or higher, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tant que le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de l'Adepte est supérieur ou égal à 10, celui-ci bénéficie de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et ignore la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} de l'ennemi.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajan'ın{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} bonusu 10 veya daha yüksekse +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} kazanır ve düşmanların {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerlerini yok sayar.
languages.original_text: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus is 10 or higher, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
